hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.subtitle: Frontend Developer
hero.description: Crafting immersive digital experiences with modern web technologies, React Js, Vue Js, Next Js and cutting-edge 3D graphics.

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate frontend developer with over 3 years of experience creating immersive digital experiences. I specialize in building modern web applications that combine beautiful design with cutting-edge technology.
about.paragraph2: My expertise spans from traditional React development to advanced 3D web experiences using Three.js and React Three Fiber. I believe in the power of interactive design to tell compelling stories and create memorable user experiences.
about.paragraph3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or experimenting with the latest web standards and design trends.

projects.title: Featured
projects.description: A showcase of my latest work, featuring modern web applications with cutting-edge technologies and interactive experiences.

skills.title: Technical
skills.description: A comprehensive toolkit for building modern, scalable, and performant web applications with cutting-edge technologies.

seo.title: Modern Portfolio - Full Stack Developer
seo.description: Professional portfolio showcasing modern web development skills, projects, and experience with React, TypeScript, and Three.js
seo.author: Professional Developer

contact.title: Get In
contact.description: Ready to bring your ideas to life? Let's discuss your next project and create something amazing together.
contact.connectDescription: Whether you have a project in mind, want to collaborate, or just want to say hello, I'd love to hear from you. Reach out through any of the channels below.
